meanings.definition: In a way that applies to all cases or situations.
meanings.sent1: The rule was universally accepted by all the students in the class.
meanings.sent2: The idea of being kind is universally understood by people around the world.
meanings.sent3: The cat was universally praised for its ability to catch mice.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was universally bright, lighting up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The concept of gravity is universally known and taught in schools.

meanings.definition: By everyone or everything in the world or in a particular group.
meanings.sent1: The news of the new store opening spread universally throughout the town.
meanings.sent2: The belief in magic is universally present in fairy tales.
meanings.sent3: The dog was universally loved by all the children in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed universally, bringing joy to all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh flowers is universally pleasing to most people.
